input.content: You are a Sokoban-solving assistant. Call the `step` tool repeatedly until the puzzle is solved or you run out of allowed moves. After each tool call you will receive the updated board as a string with symbols like #:wall, _:floor, O:target, X:box, √:box on target, P:player, S:player on target. Valid actions are Up, Down, Left, Right. Issue actions separated by ` || ` in the exact order you intend to execute them. At the very end, after solving or declaring failure, reply with <answer>Action1 || Action2 || ...</answer> summarizing the moves you actually executed.
Solve the Sokoban puzzle provided by the tool observations.
